post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
I don't believe it's something you can learn in a day or week.

You should have been doing research on those topics for several months to understand what they are.

Anyway, try to read some articles from the link below and see if it helps at all.

http://www.xml.com/pub/a/ws/2003/09/30/soa.html

Good luck.

>Web Services 와 SOA (Service Oriented Architecture) 에 대해서 알구 싶습니다.
>Job Interview 때문인데요, 부탁드립니다.
>
post.title: [re] Web Services 와 SOA (Service Oriented Architecture) 에 대해서 알구 싶습니다.
